participant_1.background:
I have turned my passion for juice into a business.
connor mcgregor is my favorite fighter.
My dogs are my best friends and I want to learn how to be a better dog owner.
I came to know my family by growing up with them.
i love hiking and staying fit.

participant_2.background:
I love the food my family prepares for me.
i am a nurse.
i love watching grey s anatomy.
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.
my glasses are always dirty and i cannot seem to get them clean.

content.text: Hello, I'm interested in talking about dogs.
Hi there, I'm a nurse who loves her dogs.
That's great, I also have a couple of dogs.
Oh wow, what types of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a beagle.
Those are such cute breeds, I bet they're so much fun to have around.
They are, they're always up for a good adventure.
I love that, I can't wait to have a home with a big yard so my dogs can run and play more.
That's great, I'm sure your dogs will love having the space to run around.
I know they will, they're always getting into trouble when they don't have enough space to run.
Haha, I know the feeling, my dogs are always getting into trouble too.
At least we know they're having fun.
That's true, they always seem to be happy.
I'm glad you're a dog lover, I feel like we could be friends.
I think we could be too, I'm always looking for new people to talk to about dogs
